title: Johnny Get Your Gun
description: The original title of a book now called Death for a Playmate:Follow black homicide detective Virgil Tibbs as he investigates the scene of black-white conflict in Pasadena. There are riots, brutalities, an action-packed chase through Disneyland, and a heart-warming and heartbreaking scene at the end of the book in the baseball park of the California Angels.
author: John Dudley Ball
